headline: Perfect Chicken Alfredo
name: Perfect Chicken Alfredo

video.description: This is the ultimate alfredo recipe.
video.name: One-Pot Chicken Alfredo Is Perfectly Creamy

review.reviewBody: Had a great flavor.  I should have cooked the noodles in the sauce ,as stated, because it was too thin cooking separately, but my pot was too small.   Definitely make again.

This is, quite frankly, the best alfredo I’ve ever had in or out of a restaurant. I’ve made it so many times I almost know it by heart. I’ve made it with fettuccine, angel hair, and orecchiette pasta. I’ve made the sauce thinner and thicker with different spices and veggies. You really can’t go wrong with this recipe. It’s beautiful as is and is easy to add something new if you’re up to it. The trick (for me) to cooking the pasta fully with the amount of wet ingredients is to cook low and slow. But even if cooking with medium/high heat it’s fine. Just add some more broth and milk to the pan as needed. It really is the simplest one-pan meal ever and tastes great. Thanks for the recipe!
Easy, tasty and delicious! Will do this again. It’s weird cooking the noodles in the milk but it worked! Will definitely make this again.

WOW!!! VERY DELICIOUS. I added butter with the oil for my chicken. Everything was tender and full of flavor. My 5 year old said, "Mommy. This is the yummiest thing I've ever had!" So it's a HUGE win for me! Thank you!!!
Very easy and tasty! This was a hit with the kiddos. Thanks for sharing!

I made this tonight and things turned out absolutely perfect! I had four chicken breasts so I doubled the ingredients as well as eyeballed how much salt and pepper I wanted on my chicken. Long story short, this meal is a HIT with the fam! Next time I’m going to make it with shrimp 😋😋

I actually doubled the sauce ingredients, we like more sauce. I used 12oz of fettuccini and it was perfect! I did lower the amount of milk just a bit and added more cream instead.  Will definitely put this is my rotation!
This recipe was amazing, however I do have to say that we did have to add more liquid in order for the pasta to cook throughfully.  Thus, it was a delish ! 😋👍
This is very good a 5 star meal! I would recommend this.

Super easy and very tasty! One thing I’m going to do next time is cut back on the Parmesan cheese (maybe add 1/2 cup to 3/4 cup) instead of the full 1 cup. Chicken was very moist and actually very flavorful.

This was delicious. I took the advice of some of the other posts and cooked my noodles separate from the rest. I just couldn't get my sauce to thicken up how I like my sauce and I added cayenne pepper and red bell pepper. Overall it was delicious. Thanks for sharing

description: Oh, chicken alfredo﻿: It's the classic pasta we just can't seem to get enough of. Of course there are tons of jarred pasta sauces﻿ you can buy, but making alfredo from-scratch is actually so easy.
keywords: one pot pasta, one pot meals, chicken alfredo, chicken alfredo recipe, alfredo sauce recipe, one-pot alfredo
